de.tif.jacob.screen
Interface ISelectionProvider

All Known Subinterfaces:
IBrowser, IInFormBrowser, ITableListBox
public interface ISelectionProvider

Interface common to all objects that provide a selection like Browsers, Trees or Listboxes.

Method Summary
 void addSelectionAction(ISelectionAction action)
          Add an action to the element.
 ISelection getSelection()
          Returns the current selection for this provider.
 void removeAllSelectionActions()
          Remove all selection actions from the element.
 void removeSelectionAction(ISelectionAction action)
          Remove an action from the element.

Returns the current selection for this provider.
This method never returns null.
